testcase.classname: I want to Login to ServiceNow application
testcase.system-out: Given User launches the chrome browser and enters the url...................passed When User provides UserName and Password....................................passed Then User login to ServiceNow successfully..................................passed Then User Clicks on StartBuilding...........................................passed Then Click on All and navigate to Service catalog...........................passed Then Click on Peripherals...................................................passed Then Click on Logitech Wireless Mouse.......................................passed Then Set Order Mouse Qty to two.............................................passed Then Click on Request Number................................................passed Then Click on Request Number and update details.............................passed Then Navigate to Requested Item details.....................................passed Then Update Requested Item details..........................................passed Then User add work Notes...................................................passed Then User Closes the Task...................................................passed Then User adds Additional Comments..........................................passed Then User deletes the task and quit the browser.............................passed
